name: Jasmine Kaur
bio: Jasmine is a passionate educator and cybersecurity advocate with over a decade of experience in making complex technical topics accessible to diverse audiences. She founded TECH-NEST to bridge the knowledge gap in digital safety.

name: Ben Carter
bio: Ben leads the development of our educational materials, from workshop curricula to podcast episodes. He has a background in journalism and a knack for storytelling that brings cybersecurity issues to life.

name: Elena Rodriguez
bio: Elena builds partnerships with schools, libraries, and community organizations. Her work ensures that TECH-NEST's programs reach the people who need them most, fostering a more inclusive digital future.
